ascendant: ASCENDANT — YOUR VIBE, AESTHETIC & OPENING SCENE ENERGY
sun_sign: SUN — YOUR CORE GENRE & MAIN CHARACTER ARCHETYPE
sun_house:
SUN IN THE HOUSES — Where You Radiate
→  The house your Sun lands in shows the stage where your soul wants to shine. It's your spotlight zone — the arena of life where you're meant to express your vitality, confidence, and creativity.
moon_sign: MOON — YOUR EMOTIONAL CLIMATE & INNER CINEMA
moon_house:
MOON IN THE HOUSES — Your Emotional Habitat
→ The house your Moon lives in shows where you seek comfort, safety, and emotional fulfillment. It's your inner world — the secret cinema of your soul.
chart_ruler: CHART RULER — WHO’S DIRECTING THE SCENE → Your chart ruler is the ruling planet of your Ascendant sign. Its sign and house show how your storyline unfolds and who’s directing the vibe behind the scenes.
chart_ruler_houses: CHART RULER IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOUR STORY UNFOLDS → The house shows where the story unfolds. Below, each house takes on a unique aesthetic depending on its sign — aka, the set design of your cosmic stage.
mercury_sign: MERCURY — YOUR MENTAL EDITING ROOM & DIALOGUE STYLE
mercury_house:
MERCURY IN THE HOUSES — Your Mind's Operating System
→ Mercury shows how you think and speak — but the house shows what you're always thinking about. This is your inner narrator's favorite topic.
venus_sign: VENUS — YOUR LOVE AESTHETIC & ATTRACTION STYLE
venus_house:
VENUS IN THE HOUSES — Love Language & Aesthetic Aura
→ Venus shows what you find beautiful, how you attract love and pleasure, and what makes you feel adored. In each house, Venus reveals where you seek harmony and sparkle.
mars_sign: MARS — YOUR DRIVE, DESIRE & ACTION SEQUENCES
mars_house:
MARS IN THE HOUSES — Your Drive, Fire & Fight
→ Mars shows where you're bold, gutsy, and determined. This house is your arena of action — where you chase goals and stir up passion (or drama).
jupiter_sign: JUPITER — YOUR LUCK, FAITH AND EXPANSION ARCHETYPE
jupiter_house:
JUPITER IN THE HOUSES — Where You Expand & Inspire
→ The house shows where you radiate luck, growth, and Big Main Character Energy. Jupiter here says: go big or go cosmic.
saturn_sign: SATURN — YOUR TESTS, LIMITS AND LONG-GAME ROLE
saturn_house:
SATURN IN THE HOUSES — Your Masterclass in Maturity
→ Saturn shows where you face trials that build grit and wisdom. In this house, you're asked to grow up, do the work, and turn your fears into mastery.
uranus_sign: URANUS — YOUR REBEL FREQUENCY AND DISRUPTIVE GENIUS
uranus_house:
URANUS IN THE HOUSES — Where You're a Cosmic Wild Card
→ Your inner rebel, genius glitch, and lightning bolt of evolution.
neptune_sign: NEPTUNE — YOUR DREAM REALM AND GLAMOUR FIELD
neptune_house:
NEPTUNE IN THE HOUSES — Where You Dream, Dissolve & Disappear
→ The dream director in your chart, casting fog, fantasy, and spiritual downloads wherever it lands.
pluto_sign: PLUTO — YOUR POWER, DEPTH AND UNDERWORLD PLOT
pluto_house:
PLUTO IN THE HOUSES — Where You Die & Rebirth, Obsess & Transform
→ The shadow planet. Your underworld journey. The obsession that becomes your power.
houses_in_signs: HOUSES IN THE SIGNS — SET DESIGN FOR YOUR COSMIC STAGE → The house shows where the story unfolds. But the sign on the cusp tells us with what style. Below, each house takes on a unique aesthetic depending on its sign — aka, the set design of your cosmic stage.
